title: Total Per Capita Real GDP United States Metropolitan Portion (DISCONTINUED)
notes:
The All industry total includes all Private industries and Government.

Consists of all counties in a state that are parts of metropolitan statistical areas.

Gross Domestic Product of a given area divided by the resident population of the area.

For more information about this release go to http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/regional/gdp_metro/gdp_metro_newsrelease.htm.
